content.text: Hey how are you doing this evening?
I am doing great. I am about to go to a concert and I am really excited.
That's awesome! I love going to concerts. Who are you seeing?
I am seeing my favorite band, The Killers. They are so good live.
I love The Killers! I have seen them in concert a few times. They put on an amazing show.
That's awesome! I am so excited to see them. I hope they play a lot of my favorite songs.
I am sure they will. They always play a great set list.
I also hope I can find someone to sing with me. I love to sing and I hope I can find someone who is as passionate about music as I am.
I am sure you will. There are always people at concerts who love to sing.
I hope so. I am going to sing my heart out tonight.
I am sure you will. Have a great time at the concert!
